University of Bremen: The University of Bremen (German: Universit√§t Bremen) is a public university in Bremen, Germany, with approximately 23,500 people from 115 countries.[2] It is one of 11 institutions which were successful in the category "Institutional Strategies" of the Excellence Initiative launched by the Federal Government and the Federal States in 2012.[3][4] The university was also successful in the categories "Graduate Schools" and "Clusters of Excellence" of the initiative.
